function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low electricity domain score due to absence of onsite electricity generation and storage","Impact":"Increased reliance on external energy sources, higher operating costs, and increased environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implementation of onsite electricity generation and storage, and energy-efficient practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy storage solutions, and energy-efficient appliances","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and environmental organizations","Owner":"Building owners, facility management team, environmental consultants"},{"Description":"Low domestic hot water and dynamic envelope scores","Impact":"Inefficient use of resources, increased energy consumption, and negative environmental impact","Mitigation":"Installation of energy-efficient domestic hot water systems and dynamic envelope solutions","Technologies":"Energy-efficient water heaters, dynamic window systems, and insulation materials","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and environmental organizations","Owner":"Building owners, facility management team, environmental consultants"},{"Description":"Absence of occupancy detection or motion sensors, and daylight sensors for lighting domain","Impact":"Wastage of energy, higher electricity consumption, and increased operational costs","Mitigation":"Implementation of occupancy detection, motion sensors, and daylight sensors for lighting control","Technologies":"Smart lighting systems, occupancy sensors, motion sensors, and daylight harvesting systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and environmental organizations","Owner":"Building owners, facility management team, environmental consultants"}]}
